data.comment: The match has started at Stade Louis II.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Fontvieille.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Monaco in their own half.
Monaco awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Monaco's Stevan Jovetic misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 2, Goal kick for Strasbourg at Stade Louis II.
At Stade Louis II, Strasbourg are penalized for being offside.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 5, Jeremie Pignard awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Strasbourg goal kick.
Jeremie Pignard signals a Monaco throw-in in Strasbourg's half.
In the minute 7, Monaco have been awarded a corner by Jeremie Pignard.
Monaco attack but Benoit Badiashile's header doesn't find the target.
Jeremie Pignard awards Strasbourg a goal kick.
In the minute 8, Ball safe as Strasbourg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Strasbourg at Stade Louis II.
Wissam Ben Yedder scores to make it 1-0 at Stade Louis II.
In the minute 9, Great play from Kevin Volland to set up the goal.
Strasbourg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Fontvieille, Strasbourg push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 14, In Fontvieille Monaco drive forward through Aurelien Tchouameni. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Monaco.
Jeremie Pignard signals a free kick to Strasbourg in their own half.
In the minute 16, Stevan Jovetic for Monaco drives towards goal at Stade Louis II. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Monaco to take a throw-in in Strasbourg territory.
Throw-in high up the field for Monaco in Fontvieille.
In the minute 17, Can Monaco get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Strasbourg's half?
Monaco have been awarded a corner by Jeremie Pignard.
Wissam Ben Yedder for Monaco is whistled offside.
Free kick for Strasbourg in their own half.
In the minute 21, Aurelien Tchouameni (Monaco) has received a first yellow card.
Strasbourg advance rapidly upfield but Jeremie Pignard blows for offside.
In the minute 23, Monaco are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Throw-in Strasbourg.
Throw-in Strasbourg.
In the minute 27, Strasbourg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Fontvieille a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Strasbourg drive forward but Ibrahima Sissoko is judged offside.
In the minute 29, Free kick for Monaco in their own half.
Throw-in for Strasbourg at Stade Louis II.
Jeremie Pignard signals a free kick to Strasbourg.
In the minute 33, Throw-in for Monaco in the half of Strasbourg.
Free kick for Strasbourg in the half of Monaco.
Throw-in for Monaco in their own half.
In the minute 34, Jeremie Pignard awards the away team a throw-in.
Monaco awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jeremie Pignard signals a free kick to Monaco in their own half.
In the minute 38, Ball safe as Monaco is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Fode Toure.
In the minute 40, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Strasbourg close to the penalty box.
Alexander Djiku (Strasbourg) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Strasbourg drive upfield and Majeed Waris gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Monaco defender.
Fode Toure (Monaco) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 41, Monaco have a dangerous throw-in.
Fode Toure is back on his feet again.
Monaco are whistled for offside.
In the minute 43, Jeremie Pignard signals a throw-in for Monaco, close to Strasbourg's area.
Free kick Monaco.
Monaco's Cesc Fabregas gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 44, Strasbourg have a goal kick.
Free kick for Strasbourg in their own half.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Jeremie Pignard signals a free kick to Monaco in their own half.
In the minute 45, Jeremie Pignard blows to end the first-half.
Goal! Monaco extend their lead to 2-0 thanks to a Ruben Aguilar header.
Fode Toure instrumental with a fine assist.
The second-half is underway in Fontvieille.
Thierry Laurey is making the team's first substitution at Stade Louis II with Mehdi Chahiri replacing Jeanricner Bellegarde.
In the minute 46, Strasbourg make their second substitution with Dimitri Lienard replacing Majeed Waris.
Mehdi Chahiri keeps the away team in the match by reducing the deficit to 2-1.
Ludovic Ajorque with an assist there.
In the minute 48, Corner awarded to Monaco.
Throw-in for Strasbourg in their own half.
Can Strasbourg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Monaco's half?
In the minute 51, Strasbourg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Goal! Monaco extend their lead to 3-1 through Wissam Ben Yedder.
In the minute 53, That's a fine assist from Kevin Volland.
Corner awarded to Monaco.
Sofiane Diop is replacing Youssouf Fofana for Monaco at Stade Louis II.
In the minute 55, Monaco's Sofiane Diop gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Strasbourg defender.
In Fontvieille, Sofiane Diop of Monaco is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Strasbourg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 55, He's off! Aurelien Tchouameni is shown a second yellow card.
Jeremie Pignard signals a free kick to Strasbourg in their own half.
The match at Stade Louis II has been interrupted briefly for a check on Alexander Djiku, who is down injured.
In the minute 58, Monaco awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Monaco at Stade Louis II.
Free kick for Monaco in their own half.
In the minute 60, Adrien Thomasson (Strasbourg) has received a yellow card from Jeremie Pignard.
It seems as if Alexander Djiku is unable to continue. Sanjin Prcic replaces him for the away team.
The home team have replaced Stevan Jovetic with Eliot Matazo. This is the second substitution made today by Niko Kovac.
In the minute 62, Throw-in Strasbourg.
Jeremie Pignard signals a Strasbourg throw-in in Monaco's half.
Strasbourg to take a throw-in in Monaco territory.
In the minute 65, Ball safe as Monaco is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Strasbourg in the half of Monaco.
Jeremie Pignard awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 66, Strasbourg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Monaco are down to 10 men after Axel Disasi has been shown a red card.
Strasbourg have been given a penalty at Stade Louis II...
In the minute 70, Ludovic Ajorque keeps Strasbourg in contention with a penalty, making the score 3-2.
Niko Kovac (Monaco) is making a fourth substitution, with Chrislain Matsima replacing Wissam Ben Yedder.
Giulian Biancone is on a sub for Cesc Fabregas for Monaco.
In the minute 73, Strasbourg have been awarded a corner by Jeremie Pignard.
Jeremie Pignard awards the home team a throw-in.
Idriss Saadi is replacing Adrien Thomasson for the away team.
In the minute 75, Can Monaco get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Strasbourg's half?
Goal kick for Monaco at Stade Louis II.
The away team replace Ibrahima Sissoko with Lucien Kevin Zohi.
In the minute 78, Jeremie Pignard signals a free kick to Monaco in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Strasbourg needs to be cautious. Monaco have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 80, Free kick for Monaco in the half of Strasbourg.
Throw-in for Strasbourg close to the penalty box.
Strasbourg's Mehdi Chahiri gets in a shot on goal at Stade Louis II. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 81, Throw-in Strasbourg.
Throw-in for Monaco at Stade Louis II.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Fontvieille.
In the minute 84, Ball safe as Monaco is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Monaco.
Jeremie Pignard signals a free kick to Monaco.
In the minute 86, Can Monaco capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Strasbourg's half?
Jeremie Pignard awards Strasbourg a goal kick.
Throw-in for Strasbourg in the half of Monaco.
In the minute 87, Monaco awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jeremie Pignard signals a Strasbourg throw-in in Monaco's half.
In Fontvieille, Ludovic Ajorque (Strasbourg) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Throw-in high up the field for Strasbourg in Fontvieille.
Strasbourg have a dangerous throw-in.
Bingourou Kamara gets his shot on target but fails to score for Strasbourg.
Strasbourg push upfield but Jeremie Pignard quickly pulls them for offside.
Throw-in for Strasbourg in their own half.
Strasbourg have been awarded a corner by Jeremie Pignard.
Ball goes out of play for a Monaco goal kick.
Jeremie Pignard will wait an extra 5 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Corner awarded to Monaco.
Ball safe as Strasbourg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Jeremie Pignard blows to end the match. The final score is 3-2.
